command.name: update
command.description: The update command updates a module from a version control system.

option.description: The module name that should be updated

command.name: show-manifest
command.description: The show-manifest command shows the contents of the manifest.
command.help: There is a central repository (generally maintained in a version control system), which contains all the available manifests. This repository is configured in the builder.properties file. There can be only one such a repository configured in the builder. With the update-manifests command manifests are downloaded from the manifest repository and put on the local file system. The list-manifests command lists these local manifests. Only these manifests are available for the Karma runtime.
